name: uprn
description: Unique property reference number.

name: gridgb1e
description: OS grid reference Easting to 1 metre resolution.

name: gridgb1n
description: OS grid reference Northing to 1 metre resolution.

name: oa11cd
description: 2011 Census Output Area.

name: cty21cd
description: Current county to which the UPRN has been assigned. Pseudo codes are included for English UAs, Wales and Scotland.

name: ced17cd
description: County Electoral Division

name: lad21cd
description: Local Authority District (LAD): unitary authority (UA)/non-metropolitan district (NMD)/metropolitan district (MD)/London borough (LB)/council area (CA).

name: wd19cd
description: (Electoral) ward/division.

name: hlth19cd
description: Former Strategic Health Authority (SHA)/Local Health Board (LHB)/Health Board (HB)

name: ctry11cd
description: GB country.

name: rgn11cd
description: Region (former GOR).

name: pcon11cd
description: Westminster parliamentary constituency.

name: eer11cd
description: European Electoral Region (EER).

name: ttwa15cd
description: Travel to Work Area (TTWA).

name: itl21cd
description: ITL area.

name: npark16cd
description: National Park.

name: lsoa11cd
description: 2011 Census Lower Layer Super Output Area (LSOA) for England and Wales or Data Zone (DZ) for Scotland.

name: msoa11cd
description: 2011 Census Middle Layer Super Output Area (MSOA) for England and Wales or Intermediate Zone (IZ) for Scotland.

name: wz11cd
description: 2011 Census Workplace Zone for England and Wales. Pseudo code (S99999999) for Scotland.

name: ccg17cd
description: Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG) for England, Local Health Board (LHB) for Wales or Community Health Partnership (CHP) for Scotland

name: bua11cd
description: Built-up area in England and Wales. Pseudo codes are included for those OAs not classed as 'built-up' and cross-border codes are included for areas straddling the English/Welsh border. A pseudo code is also included for Scotland.

name: buasd11cd
description: Built-up Area Sub-division (BUASD) in England and Wales. Pseudo codes are included for those OAs not classed as 'built-up' and cross-border codes are included for areas straddling the English/Welsh border. A pseudo code is also included for Scotland.

name: ruc11ind
description: 2011 Census rural-urban classification of OAs for England, Wales and Scotland

name: oac11ind
description: 2011 Census Output Area classification (OAC).

name: lep17cd1
description: Primary Local Enterprise Partnership (LEP) code for each English UPRN. Pseudo codes for rest of GB.

name: lep17cd2
description: Secondary Local Enterprise Partnership (LEP) code for each English UPRN. Pseudo codes for rest of GB.

name: pfa15cd
description: Police Force Area (PFA)

name: imd19ind
description: Index of Multiple Deprivation (IMD) for the LSOA of each UPRN, where 1 is the most deprived. A zero is included for Scotland.
